benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: PUT /1.0/kb/invoicePayments/{paymentId}/customFields - Modify custom fields to payment

covered: Valid Request: PUT /1.0/kb/invoicePayments/{paymentId}/customFields tested with multiple successful update scenarios (TC01-04).
Non-Existing Resource: 404 when payment not found (TC06).
Concurrency: Concurrent updates tested to check race conditions (TC19).
Authorization: Tests cover missing/invalid tokens and headers (TC07, TC11).
Server Error Handling: 500 for database/system failures (TC12).
Invalid Input/Validation: Broad coverage of invalid inputs and validation failures (TC05, TC08, TC09, TC10, TC13, TC16, TC18).
Large Payloads: Tests for very large payloads and payload size limits (TC14, TC20).
Edge Cases: Max field length (TC15), extra unexpected parameters (TC16), injection-related input (TC13), duplicates (TC18).
Integration/Data Consistency: After-update GET confirms changes (TC17).
Performance: Performance-oriented scenarios including concurrency and large payloads (TC19, TC20).
gaps: Partial Update: No explicit test for partial updates versus full replacement semantics (PUT semantics).
Rate Limiting: No tests for rate-limiting/throttling (429).
Caching: No tests validating caching headers or ETag/Cache-Control semantics.
recommendations: Add a Partial Update test or confirm PUT semantics (replace vs partial) per API spec.
Introduce rate-limiting tests to validate behavior under high contention (expect 429).
Add caching tests to verify ETag/Cache-Control headers and cache invalidation behavior.
